original_text: God chose Jesus to be his special servant. God sent him to you first. He wants to help you, so that you stop doing bad things. That is how he will bless you.’
korean_text: 하나님이 그 종을 세워 복 주시려고 너희에게 먼저 보내사 너희로 하여금 돌이켜 각각 그 악함을 버리게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: God chose Jesus to be his special servant.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 예수님을 자신의 특별한 종으로 선택하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: God sent him to you first.
so that you stop doing bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 여러분이 악한 일을 그치게 하려는 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: That is how he will bless you.'
